entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 11:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

Humidity: 87 %

Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning overnight except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. A few wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
